Title: Relates to expanding eligibility for the cooling assistance component of the home energy assistance program
Summary: Provides that an applicant for the cooling assistance component of the home energy assistance program shall not be required to demonstrate that the household contains at least one person with a documented medical condition that is exacerbated by extreme heat to be eligible for a cooling assistance component benefit.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to expanding eligibility for the cooling assistance component of the home energy assistance program
